summary: Unlike my Crafter's Gear (Cross Promo!) you kinda have to go on a adventure for this,Go to Solitude find Castle Dour go to a dungeon cell one of them has Alphonse Elric and whats left of Edward Elric. And the ring and necklace are very small so find them. And I hope you get the reference!
descriptionHtml: Unlike my Crafter's Gear (Cross Promo!) you kinda have to go on a adventure for this,Go to Solitude find Castle Dour go to a dungeon cell one of them has Alphonse Elric and whats left of Edward Elric. And the ring and necklace are very small so find them. And I hope you get the reference!
author: Veridigo
